meta_description: The McMullen Museum aims to cultivate learning, celebrate artistic excellence, explore the visual traditions of diverse cultures, and inspire transdisciplinary faculty and student research based on the visual arts.
collections_text:
**The McMullen is closed starting June 5, reopening September 5 with[Gateway to Himalayan Art](http://web.archive.org/web/20230605210332/https://www.google.com/url?q=https://www.bc.edu/sites/artmuseum/exhibitions/himalayan/&source=gmail-imap&ust=1684766446000000&usg=AOvVaw19yUZ8x03fi8Y3YDTAMTYE). Visit [McMullen From Home](http://web.archive.org/web/20230605210332/https://www.google.com/url?q=https://www.bc.edu/sites/artmuseum/learn/from-home.html&source=gmail-imap&ust=1684766446000000&usg=AOvVaw0crpppvbE7NVCttlSZYE3m) for virtual exhibition walkthroughs, podcasts, and more!**  

  * [](exhibitions/landscape/)_Landscape of Memory: Seven Installations from the Barjeel Art Foundation (Sharjah, UAE)_
  * [](exhibitions/himalayan/)_Gateway to Himalayan Art_
  * [](exhibitions/comics/)_American Alternative Comics 1980–2000:_ Raw, Weirdo, _and Beyond_
  * [](exhibitions/jarmak/)_Arnie Jarmak: Photographing Chelsea in Transition, 1977–89_
  * [](exhibitions/)Browse the archives
  * [](collection/)Search database and view images
